home.title: Welcome to {{brandName}}
home.subtitle: Your empathetic AI companion for mental wellness. We're here to listen, support, and help you navigate life's challenges in a safe, judgment-free space.

aiSupport.title: 24/7 AI Support
aiSupport.description: Always available when you need someone to talk to, with empathetic responses tailored to your emotions.

personalGrowth.title: Personal Growth
personalGrowth.description: Track your mood, set goals, and access resources to support your mental wellness journey.

safePrivate.title: Safe & Private
safePrivate.description: Your conversations are confidential. Use anonymously or create an account for personalized support.

testimonials.title: What People Say
testimonials.testimonial1: Phases helped me during a difficult time. Having someone to talk to anytime made a real difference.
testimonials.testimonial2: The mood tracking feature helped me understand my patterns better. It's like having a gentle therapist.

chat.title: Chat with your AI companion
chat.subtitle: Share what's on your mind in a safe, judgment-free space
chat.sendHint: Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line
chat.emergencyNotice: If you're in crisis: This AI cannot replace professional help.

suggestedReplies.label: Quick responses:
suggestedReplies.talkDay: I'd like to talk about my day

chat.greeting: Hello! I'm here to listen and support you. How are you feeling today?

dashboard.title: Your Wellness Dashboard

quickActions.title: Quick Actions
quickActions.sessionSubtitle: Your AI companion is ready to listen

insights.title: Goal Insights
insights.completed: You've completed {{completed}} out of {{total}} goals this month
insights.onTrack: Your meditation goal is on track - keep it up!
insights.suggestion: Consider breaking down larger goals into smaller steps

weekProgress.title: This Week's Progress
weekProgress.content: You've had {{sessions}} meaningful conversations and your mood has been stable. Keep up the great work!

recommendation.title: Recommended Activity
recommendation.content: Try the "5-minute breathing exercise" in your resources to maintain your positive momentum.

resources.title: Wellness Resources
resources.subtitle: Discover articles, meditations, and exercises to support your mental health

emergency.title: Need Immediate Help?
emergency.subtitle: If you're in crisis or having thoughts of self-harm, please reach out for professional help immediately.

immediateDanger.title: If You're in Immediate Danger
steps: Call 911 or go to your nearest emergency room
Contact a trusted friend or family member
Remove any means of self-harm from your area
Stay with someone until help arrives

difficultThoughts.title: If You're Having Difficult Thoughts
steps: Call or text a crisis hotline
Reach out to a mental health professional
Contact a trusted friend or family member
Use grounding techniques to stay present

onlineCommunities.title: Online Support Communities
items: 7 Cups - Free emotional support
Crisis Text Line - Text-based crisis support
NAMI Support Groups - Find local support

professionalHelp.title: Professional Help
items: Psychology Today - Find therapists
BetterHelp - Online therapy platform
Local mental health services

emergency.disclaimer: This AI companion is not a replacement for professional mental health care. If you're experiencing a mental health crisis, please contact the appropriate emergency services or mental health professionals in your area.

about.title: About {{brandName}}
about.subtitle: Understanding our mission to support mental wellness

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: We envision a world where mental health support is accessible to everyone, regardless of location, time, or circumstances. {{brandName}} represents our commitment to breaking down barriers that prevent people from seeking help when they need it most.

empathetic.title: Empathetic Support
empathetic.content: Provide compassionate, non-judgmental support through AI technology that understands and responds to emotional needs with care and sensitivity.

accessible.title: Accessible Care
accessible.content: Make mental health support available 24/7, removing geographical, financial, and social barriers that often prevent people from getting help.

safe.title: Safe Environment
safe.content: Create a secure, private space where individuals can express themselves freely without fear of judgment or breach of confidentiality.

complement.title: Complement Professional Care
complement.content: Bridge the gap between professional therapy sessions and daily life, providing ongoing support that complements traditional mental health care.

step1.title: Start a Conversation
step1.content: Begin chatting immediately - no signup required. Share what's on your mind in a judgment-free environment.

step2.title: Receive Empathetic Support
step2.content: Our AI analyzes your emotional state and responds with appropriate empathy, validation, and helpful suggestions.

step3.title: Access Resources & Track Progress
step3.content: Get personalized resource recommendations and optionally track your mood and goals over time with an account.

limitations.title: Important: AI Limitations & Disclaimer

canDo.title: What {{brandName}} Can Do
items: Provide empathetic listening and emotional support
Offer coping strategies and mindfulness techniques
Share educational resources about mental health
Help you reflect on your thoughts and feelings
Suggest when professional help might be beneficial

cannotDo.title: What {{brandName}} Cannot Do
items: Provide professional medical or psychological diagnosis
Replace therapy or professional mental health treatment
Handle emergency situations or crisis intervention
Prescribe medications or provide medical advice
Guarantee specific outcomes or treatment success

limitations.crisis: If you're experiencing a mental health crisis or having thoughts of self-harm, please seek immediate professional help or contact emergency services.

empathy.title: Empathy First
empathy.description: Every interaction is guided by genuine care and understanding

privacy.title: Privacy & Safety
privacy.description: Your privacy and emotional safety are our highest priorities

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Mental health support should be available to everyone, everywhere

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We work alongside, not in place of, professional mental health care

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have questions, feedback, or want to learn more about {{brandName}}? We'd love to hear from you.

privacy.title: Privacy & Safety
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy and safety are our top priorities

anonymity.title: Complete Anonymity Option
anonymity.subtitle: Use Without Creating an Account
anonymity.description: You can use {{brandName}} completely anonymously without creating an account. No personal information is required to start a conversation.
features: No registration required for basic chat functionality
Conversations are not linked to your identity
You control what information you share

anonymous.title: Anonymous Users
items: Conversations are processed for AI responses only
No data is permanently stored
No personal identifiers are collected
Session data is cleared after you leave

registered.title: Registered Users
items: Chat history saved for continuity
Mood tracking data for personal insights
Progress tracking for goals
You can delete your data anytime

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: All conversations are encrypted in transit

rights.title: Your Privacy Rights
rights.anonymity: Use our service without providing any personal information
rights.access: View all data we have about you
rights.deletion: Delete your account and all associated data
rights.portability: Export your data in a readable format
rights.correction: Update or correct your personal information

aiSafety.title: AI Safety & Limitations
limitations: This AI is not a licensed therapist or medical professional
AI responses are generated based on patterns, not professional judgment
Cannot diagnose mental health conditions or provide medical advice
Not suitable for emergency situations or crisis intervention
Should complement, not replace, professional mental health care

contact.title: Questions About Privacy?
contact.description: If you have any questions about our privacy practices or want to exercise your privacy rights, please contact us:
contact.address: Address: 123 Privacy Lane, Safety City, SC 12345

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: It looks like you've wandered into uncharted territory. Don't worry, we're here to guide you back to safety.
notFound.whereToGo: Where would you like to go?
notFound.needSupport: You can always start a conversation with our AI companion - no account needed, completely private.

footer.description: Your empathetic AI companion for mental wellness. Available 24/7 to provide support, resources, and a safe space to talk.
footer.disclaimer: If you're experiencing a mental health crisis, please contact emergency services or call a crisis hotline immediately. This AI is not a replacement for professional mental health care.
